(#{ShelfPositionInformation.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.shelfPositionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.shelfPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.shelfPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.goodsShelvesNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.shelfPositionLayerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.shelfPositionRowNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.goodsShelvesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.goodsShelvesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.warehouseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.warehousePersonInCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.openingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.dimensionUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.massUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.areaUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.capacity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.length,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.wide,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.usageRecord,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ShelfPositionInformation.isItEmpty,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select:
select * from tbl_shelf_position_information
and goods_shelves_no like CONCAT('%',#{goodsShelvesNo},'%' )
and shelf_position_code like CONCAT('%',#{shelfPositionCode},'%')
and warehouse_person_in_charge like CONCAT('%',#{warehousePersonInCharge},'%')
and warehouse_code like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseCode},'%')
and warehouse_name like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName},'%')
and shelf_position_row_no like CONCAT('%',#{shelfPositionRowNo},'%')
and shelf_position_layer_no like CONCAT('%',#{shelfPositionLayerNo},'%')
and warehouse_type like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseType},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
select count(*) from tbl_shelf_position_information where warehouse_type=#{warehouseType} and is_it_empty=#{isItEmpty}

SELECT tbl_shelf_position_information.commodity_id FROM tbl_shelf_position_information WHERE tbl_shelf_position_information.commodity_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tbl_shelf_position_information.commodity_id
SELECT COUNT(tbl_shelf_position_information.commodity_id) FROM tbl_shelf_position_information WHERE is_it_empty=1 AND tbl_shelf_position_information.commodity_id=#{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
